meanings.definition: A type of complex carbohydrate found in connective tissues.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that mucopolysaccharides are important for our skin's health.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are studying the role of mucopolysaccharides in joint flexibility.
meanings.sent3: Why did the cookie go to the doctor? It had too many mucopolysaccharides!
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was as strong as the bonds between mucopolysaccharides in tissues.
meanings.sent5: The spider wove its web with mucopolysaccharides, creating a strong structure.

meanings.definition: Polysaccharides containing amino sugars, found in the body.
meanings.sent1: Athletes often consume foods rich in mucopolysaccharides to support their muscles.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained how mucopolysaccharides play a role in cell structure.
meanings.sent3: Why did the cell phone break up with the amino acid? It found someone sweeter - mucopolysaccharides!
meanings.sent4: The bond between them was as complex as the structure of mucopolysaccharides.
meanings.sent5: The body's repair process relies on the presence of mucopolysaccharides for healing.
